title: Pop Goes the Weasel
short_plot_summary: Pop Goes the Weasel is a nursery rhyme where a playful monkey chases a weasel around the spinning wheel, and when the wheel goes 'pop,' the weasel gets surprised and the rhyme ends.
explanation: A monkey, representing the playful character in the nursery rhyme
A Ferris wheel, symbolizing the spinning wheel in the song
A pushpin, illustrating the 'pop' sound and moment the weasel is caught
A party popper, signifying the surprise and excitement when the weasel 'pops'
